Title: The Pointy End of the Spear
Plot: Kylie works with Admiral Shepard to bring down the President, using evidence of what really happened in Pakistan. This affords Marcus the opportunity to surrender the Colorado, if all goes according to plan. Meanwhile, Speaker of the House Conrad Buell, meets with a small group of Washington heavyweights to discuss the unthinkable when Kylie?s video information helps persuade him to participate in a risky and treasonous maneuver.
GuestStars: David Rees Snell, Jessica Camacho, Michael Gaston, Ernie Hudson, Will Rothhaar, Michael Mosley, Chin Han, Michael Ng, Bruce Davison
